name: Dimension Traveler
info: Learn to walk between dimensions by mastering dimensional energy and unlocking the secrets of the multiverse.
accept: I'm ready to learn dimensional travel.
decline: The dimensional barriers are too dangerous for me.

objectives.dimension_scholar: Meet with the Void Researcher to learn dimension theory
objectives.dimension_theory: Collect 3 written books on dimension theory
objectives.nether_essence: Collect 20 blaze powder as nether essence
objectives.soul_fragments: Collect 32 soul sand as soul fragments
objectives.dimension_portal: Craft 12 end portal frames for dimension portal
objectives.void_survival: Survive 10 minutes in the void dimension
objectives.void_crystals: Collect 30 amethyst shards as void crystals
objectives.dimension_catalyst: Craft 3 nether stars as dimension catalyst
objectives.dimension_crown: Obtain 1 netherite helmet as dimension crown

dialogs: The barriers between dimensions grow thin, traveler.
You have the potential to walk between worlds.
But first, you must learn to harness dimensional energy.
Your mastery over dimensional forces grows stronger.
Each portal reveals new secrets of the multiverse.
You have become a true master of dimensional travel!
The infinite realms await your exploration, Dimension Traveler.
